name: Nuitrition
description: In this course, you’ll start to demystify the complex and conflicting messages we hear about nutrition, health, and lifestyle in the news and media in general. If nutrition is important to you, this course will help you understand the scientific basis of human nutrition.

name: Discoveries science
description: If you are working in the field of science and would like to practice and improve your science writing skills, this CPD-certified course will help you to succeed. Which scientific discoveries will you choose to write about?

name: Innovation: the Fashion Industry
description: If you’re interested in studying fashion at university but want to see what it’s like first, this might be the course for you. You’ll start by looking at how Marks & Spencer continues to drive innovation to bring consumers new and better products.
